message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.NE 

The paper deals with improving the robustness of classifiers through adversarial training and curvature regularization. This topic is closely related to machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper discusses the vulnerability of classifiers to attacks (cs.CR) and proposes a new regularizer to improve robustness (cs.NE). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.CV, and cs.AI, followed by cs.CR and cs.NE.
